title: Push Health: Telehealth App
description:
Push Health is your personal telehealth app, providing convenient, reliable, and secure medical services from the comfort of your home. Whether you need a prescription refill, virtual consultation, or lab testing, Push Health connects you with licensed medical providers ready to assist you. Transparent, affordable pricing with no health insurance or subscriptions required.

Join the 1,000,000+ patients who have made Push Health their go-to telehealth solution. Download now and experience a seamless, personalized healthcare experience like never before.

FOR PATIENTS
Navigating the healthcare system can be overwhelming, inconvenient, and costly. Push Health simplifies this process, offering a hassle-free way to connect with licensed medical providers for a range of medical services - all without leaving your home.

WHY PUSH HEALTH?
Convenience: Access healthcare anytime, anywhere.
Efficiency: Streamlined process enables faster, more efficient care.
Affordability: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees.
Quality Care: Connect with licensed and experienced providers.
Privacy: Secure, encrypted communication protects your health information.

HOW IT WORKS
Sign Up: Download Push Health and create your account in minutes.
Connect: Choose a service and connect with an independent, licensed medical provider.
Receive Care: Get medical advice, prescriptions, and lab tests as needed.
Follow Up: Receive follow-up care and manage your health through the app.

POPULAR SERVICES :
Antibiotics: Azithromycin, Augmentin, Cephalexin, Clindamycin, Z-Pak
Asthma: Albuterol, ProAir, Ventolin
Weight Loss: Zepbound, Ozempic, Wegovy, Saxenda, Semaglutide, Tirzepatide

OTHER CONDITIONS & PRESCRIPTION REFILLS:
Acne: Aczone, Dapsone, Doxycycline, Tretinoin
Anti-Inflammatory: Prednisone
Antivirals: Acyclovir, Valtrex
Antidepressants: Prozac, Sertraline, Zoloft
Birth Control: Apri, Xulane, Yaz
Diabetes: Glyburide, Glipizide, Metformin, Mounjaro
Erectile Dysfunction: Cialis, Levitra, Sildenafil, Tadalafil, Viagra
Eye Care: Latisse, Vuity
Hair Loss: Finasteride, Minoxidil, Propecia
High Blood Pressure: Amlodipine, Lasix, Lisinopril, Losartan, Metoprolol, Propranolol
Cholesterol: Atorvastatin, Simvastatin
Scabies: Ivermectin, Permethrin
Strep Throat: Amoxicillin, Penicillin
Thyroid: Levothyroxine, Synthroid
UTI: Bactrim, Ciprofloxacin, Nitrofurantoin
Yeast Infections: Fluconazole, Diflucan

Push Health is available in the United States.

FOR MEDICAL PROVIDERS
Push Health provides the tools you need to operate a secure, virtual medical practice. Create your free account, set your professional fee, and start connecting with patients today. Connected with 55,000+ pharmacies and integrated with Quest Diagnostics for lab testing, Push Health ensures secure, efficient service delivery. Through Push Health, you can message securely with patients and other providers, document encounters, e-prescribe, order labs, and send invoices with just a few clicks.
Whether you are looking to grow an online practice with new patients or serve your own patients or network, Push Health can help you take your practice online. Join the thousands of medical providers using Push Health to practice independently again today.
Key Features for Providers:
KEY FEATURES FOR PROVIDERS:
Bank-level security and encryption
Connected to 55,000+ pharmacies
Integrated with thousands of lab locations in the United States
LegitScript certified

TESTIMONIAL
"I frequently get asked for medical advice from patients and my personal network when I am outside of the ER or the office. Push Health enables me to document electronically and send prescriptions, lab orders, messages and invoices to patients from my mobile phone and eliminates many of the hassles of being curbsided. I think Push Health is a big step in the right direction for improving access to healthcare."
- Stephen Phan, MD
For more information, please visit our FAQ page: pushhealth.com/pages/faq
